templates.template: <xf:macro name="gender" arg-user="!"> <xf:selectrow name="sxfcore_gender" label="{{ phrase('sxfcore_gender') }}" value="{$user.sxfcore_gender}"> <xf:option value="">{{ phrase('no_selection') }}</xf:option> <xf:option value="male">{{ phrase('sxfcore_gender_male') }}</xf:option> <xf:option value="female">{{ phrase('sxfcore_gender_female') }}</xf:option> </xf:selectrow> </xf:macro>
